Pets - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $250.00, Rent $35.00, Deposit $250.00 Comments: $250 one-time pet deposit is per apartment.
$250 pet fee is per pet.
Cats and Dogs Welcome!
At Axis at Nine Mile Station in Denver, we love your pets just as much as you do!
Because of that, Axis at Nine Mile Station is not just pet-friendly property, but a pet-enthusiastic property.
Your pets will find just as inviting a home here as you will.
With a large dog park, your dogs will find spacious room to run around and play.
With our outdoor areas, your dogs will forget they are not living on a farm!
Your cat deserves a home that will love her as much as you love her!
Axis at Nine Mile Station offers options so that your pet can focus on the things that really matter: making you happy!
With nearby veterinary hospitals, you will not have to worry about your pet's health.
Restrictions: Breed and weight restrictions.
